closed_or_rejected_prs.status: closed by maintainer due to framework bug (multiple PRs in one run merged incorrectly)

framework_note: CRITICAL: Only create ONE PR per run. The framework has a bug where if create_pull_request is called multiple times, only one PR is created with wrong mixed content.

Investigate IAsyncDisposable migration (issue #230) - waiting for dsyme to confirm approach (a=additive, b=replace IDisposable)
Consider test package major-version updates (NUnit 3.9->4.x, MS.Test.Sdk 16->18, coverlet 6->8) - deferred - NUnit 4 has breaking API changes
